resources.string: Please Enter The Bright Time In Minuets
The app will let the screen bright be On for 20 min then it will Dim for 10 seconds with muting the audio. At any time you can hit the screen three times and the app will close.
By this tool, you can limit the user/babies to use or watch videos and games for a defined time. Then when time is finished the screen bright will Dim for a limited time.

In the professional version, you can change the time the screen will be bright and the time that will be Dim. The professional version is without advertisements. You can use the play dead bottom which will turn the bright off until you tap on the screen three times.
Please Buy the Pro Version To Activate it,Or Enter a value between 1 and 20 mint
Because we care about you, we make this app to help you and your children to limit the use of the smartphone for a defined time you set.
mint the screen will be bright then it will dim
